title:
Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs; Dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers; sound-activated compression reaction of 0.02 seconds with independent volume controls;
Noise reduction 23 dB; 2 omnidirectional microphones; audio input jack; recessed volume control knobs; 2 AAA batteries (included); size: 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches; weight: 0.98 pounds
descriptions:
Introducing Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs, the ultimate companion for your shooting range adventures! These earmuffs feature dynamic high-definition speakers that deliver crystal clear sound, while the sound-activated compression reacts in just 0.02 seconds for maximum protection. With independent volume controls, 23 dB noise reduction, and 2 omnidirectional microphones, you'll never miss a beat.

The recessed volume control knobs and audio input jack provide convenience and customization to suit your needs. Plus, with 2 AAA batteries included, you can enjoy long-lasting use. These earmuffs are designed to be comfortable with a metal wire frame headband and foldable for easy storage.

Don't compromise on safety or quality when it comes to hearing protection. Choose Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs and elevate your shooting experience to the next level. Get yours today!

Introducing Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs, the ultimate hearing protection for your shooting range adventures! These earmuffs feature dynamic high-definition speakers that deliver crystal-clear sound, while the sound-activated compression reacts in just 0.02 seconds to protect your ears. With independent volume controls and noise reduction of 23 dB, you can customize your listening experience with ease.

Equipped with 2 omnidirectional microphones and an audio input jack, these earmuffs offer top-notch functionality. The recessed volume control knobs ensure a sleek and easy-to-use design. Plus, with 2 AAA batteries included, you can start using them right out of the box.

Measuring at 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches and weighing only 0.98 pounds, these earmuffs are lightweight and comfortable to wear. The metal wire frame headband provides a secure and comfortable fit, while the foldable design allows for easy storage.

Don't compromise on your hearing protection â€“ choose Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs for a premium shooting range experience.
